gaza.title: Please help 🍉
description: This is not a political or religious question.
This is a human rights one.
Acting against a genocide happening live before our eyes at Gaza doesn't make us anti-Semitic or pro-hamas.
If you can't afford giving money, please share one of the following options, it's as important 💖
gaza.t4p_info: You can use {URL} overlay that only shows verified fundraisers. Once current donation bar is complete, another verified fundraiser is shown.
